title: Nation Flag Watch Face
summary: This is simple yet elegant watch face with Countries Flag in Shield Form.
description: Features1. More suitable for round watch2. Ambient Mode3. Black / White Accent4. Multi nation flags: USA, India, France, German, Scotland, UK5. Smooth/Tick Clock MovementNotes1. Settings are accessible from both Android Wear Application on the phone and the wear device itself.2. If the it doesn't appear try to uninstall, disconnect from phone, restart, reconnect and install it again.
descriptionHTML:
Features
1. More suitable for round watch
2. Ambient Mode
3. Black / White Accent
4. Multi nation flags: USA, India, France, German, Scotland, UK
5. Smooth/Tick Clock Movement

Notes
1. Settings are accessible from both Android Wear Application on the phone and the wear device itself.
2. If the it doesn't appear try to uninstall, disconnect from phone, restart, reconnect and install it again.
